definition: the allotment of some amount by dividing something, make into a wrapped container
details:
noun
- the allotment of some amount by dividing something
= synonyms: share
- a wrapped container
= synonyms: package
- a collection of things wrapped or boxed together
= synonyms: bundle, packet, package
- an extended area of land
= synonyms: tract, piece of ground, parcel of land, piece of land
verb
- make into a wrapped container
- cover with strips of canvas
= example: cover with strips of canvas
- divide into parts
= example: divide into parts
